statement.p: Out of the last 49 days, it rained 17 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{17}}{{49}}={0.3469387755102}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.3469387755102}={34.69387755102} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 34.69 .
